thread.section_title: NiceBadge Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NiceBadge | nicebadge.com
thread.title: Sylvia Lewis

author: Sylvia Lewis
title: Sylvia Lewis
text: Very few companies these days truly provide top notch customer service and even fewer actually stand by their product the way NiceBadge does. They recently replaced an item for me that had become damaged. When they say their products are guaranteed they mean it. KateeZ was so incredible with concern and follow-up with several emails and a phone call. I am so impressed with both the company and KateeZ's level of customer service and product. Thank You
